name: VaporBeach
description:
A game that was created for the game jam "I can't draw but I want to make a game".

The theme was "Beach".

This is a simple point and click game, where you have to right click to choose how to interact with objects.

Very buggy as I attempted to do an all nighter to try and get a majority of it done before handing it in.

Big shout out to Sam who did all the amazing music and SFX for the game! If you're interested in hearing more of his awesome music follow him on Instagram
